Class MovingAverageProxy

java.lang.Object
  vista.set.DataReference
      vista.set.UnaryOperationProxy

All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable, Named
public class MovingAverageProxy
extends UnaryOperationProxy

A proxy representing a moving average operation on the given reference.

Version:
$Id: MovingAverageProxy.java,v 1.1 2003/10/02 20:49:27 redwood Exp $
Author:
Nicky Sandhu
See Also:
Serialized Form

Constructor Summary
MovingAverageProxy(DataReference ref, int backLength, int forwardLength)
          Creates a proxy which is the moving average of the data contained in the given reference averaged using backLength previous points, the current point and forwardLength next points.
